author: Medea Giordano
title: The CDC Now Recommends Americans Wear Face Masks
description: Staying home is still the best way to protect yourself from the coronavirus. But the CDC now says that masks are effective as an additional measure.
content: On Friday, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommended that citizens should wear "non-medical, cloth masks" to help prevent the spread of the coronavirus. Previously, the CDC had recommended that only those with Covid-19 symptoms wear masks.… [+3732 chars]
